item.title: Visual Studio Code plus Google Cloud Shell
item.description: It’s practical to access a Cloud Shell VM file system remotely (using ssh, natch) using Visual Studio Code. I’m using this to explore the development of Google Assistant apps because I’d prefer not install Node.JS and npm on my workstation. You may enumerate your Cloud Shell VMs access details with: curl \ --header "Authorization: Bearer $(gcloud auth print-access-token)" \ --header "Accept: application/json" \ https://cloudshell.googleapis.com/v1alpha1/users/me/environments/default You should receive: { "name": "users/[[EMAIL]]/environments/default", "id": "default", "dockerImage": "gcr.
